articles.title: Denver Votes on Whether to Decriminalize ‘Magic Mushrooms’
articles.description: A measure on the ballot Tuesday would make psilocybin, the psychedelic compound in some mushrooms, the lowest priority for law enforcement in Denver.
articles.content:
Arrests in Denver for incidents involving psilocybin have not numbered more than 59 in any of the last three years, and only 11 cases were prosecuted in that time.
